title: Textile, "Froggy", 1976
medium:
Medium: polyester, cotton
Technique: printed by rotary screen on plain weave with paired warps
markings: Printed on left side: copyright Schumacher and Co. Printed on left side: "Froggy" an exclusive Schumacher screen print.
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 284 x 141 cm (9 ft. 3 13/16 in. x 55 1/2 in.)
Repeat L: 63.5 cm (25 in.)
creditline: Gift of F. Schumacher and Co.
description: Half drop repeat of three brite green frogs surrounded by jonquils on a brite yellow background. Two frogs are hopping and the other sits with a pink flower in it's mouth. Lengths of fabric placed side by side continue pattern.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Froggy", 1976.
1976. Medium: polyester, cotton
Technique: printed by rotary screen on plain weave with paired warps. Gift of F. Schumacher and Co.. 1977-68-3.
